person.persName: Porton B. Clark (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of Cyrus Clark and Hannah George Clark. Married to Teresa A. Baker Clark in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on December 16, 1857. Father of Lucinda D. Clark, George Clark, Cyrus Clark, and Hannah Clark. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Student in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.
